item.description:
Hussein Alhadi, Graduate of Sedona Training and BostonLOA member, shared with us at our In-Person meetup on Tuesday 4/1 the power behind the Sedona Method releasing techniques.

It's a wonderful companion tool to use to gently release feelings around negative or limiting beliefs and/or thoughts. You'll then find yourself aligning more easily to the higher "more joyful"vibrations related to LOA.

Many members are interested to learn The Sedona Method more in depth. So Hussein is graciously leading a TELE- STUDY GROUP related to The Sedona Method.

THANKS-A-LOT, Hussein, for your gift of time & knowledge as facilitator of this TELE-Study Group!

The Study Group is on Sundays, 9 - 10 pm. This is at least an 8-weeks commitment. The participants would read the current week's "assignment", join a conference call to discuss and then practice the release method(s).

DETAILS:

First call: this Sunday, April 6th

Time: 9 - 10 pm

Telephone Bridge Line: Emailed when you RSVP "YES"

General Weekly Discussion Topics:

Week 1 (this Sunday, April 6 ) Basics:
Introduce The Sedona Method. Discuss the various ways of releasing. Do group release(s).
Answer questions.

Go to "Files" to access the assigned handout "BostonLOA_TheSedonaMethod" to be discussed this Sunday, 4/6.

http://files.meetup.c...
( Sign in first to access this document. )



Week 2- More Basics: Talk about the 5 wants (approval, control, security, separation, oneness), how resistance holds us back, how we can release resistance, do a release on resistance.

Week 3- Goals: How to word goals. Set goals and then release on them releasing the 5 wants.

Week 4-More on Goals: Letting go of Fear & Anxiety. Releasing the I Can?t in Lust, From scarcity to enough. Holistic releases on wealth and success. Advantadges/Disadvantages Method.. Action steps on reaching goals.

Week 5-6 Relationships:
Introduce the Cleanup Procedure., Loving your partner as your partner is, Letting go of wanting to blame your partner for what you experience, Walking in the other Person?s shoes. Dissolving beliefs, I am enough.

Week 7-8 Health and Well Being:
Accepting that change is Possible, Accepting your body as it is, Dissolving Feelings that cause ?dis-ease?, Holistic Release on effortless health and well being.


About Hussein Alhadi
husseincoach@yahoo.com
617-304-6162

Hussein is a personal & business coach and an enthusiastic student and "practice-ioner" of Law Of Attraction.
He is a Graduate of Sedona Training.

group.name: The Boston Law of Attraction Meetup Group

item.name: Initial TELE-Meetup for The Sedona Method Study Group
